DateParameter: Different date options for the Real Time Clock
TimeParameter: Different time options for the Real Time Clock
ZipLedColors: Well known colors for ZIP LEDs
kitronik_halo_hd: Kitronik ZIP Halo HD MakeCode Package
kitronik_halo_hd.HueInterpolationDirecti: Options for direction hue changes, used by rainbow block (never visible to end user)
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.clear:
Turn off all LEDs on the ZIP Halo display.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.range|param|l: number of LEDs in the range. eg: 4
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.range|param|s: offset in the LED strip to start the range
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.rotate:
Rotate LEDs forward.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.rotate|param|: number of ZIP LEDs to rotate forward, eg: 1
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.setBrightness: Set the brightness of the ZIP Halo display. This flag only applies to future show operation.
a measure of LED brightness in 0-255. eg: 255
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.setColor: Sets whole ZIP Halo display as a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b). Call Show to make changes visible
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.setZipLedColo:
Set particular ZIP LED to a given color. 
You need to call ``show changes`` to make the changes visible.
RGB color of the ZIP LED
position of the ZIP LED in the string
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.show: Send all the changes to the ZIP Halo display.
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.showBarGraph:
Displays a vertical bar graph based on the `value` and `high` value.
If `high` is 0, the chart gets adjusted automatically.
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.showColor: Shows whole ZIP Halo display as a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.showRainbow: Shows a rainbow pattern on all LEDs.
kitronik_halo_hd.ZIPHaloHd.showRainbow|p: the end hue value for the rainbow, eg: 360
the start hue value for the rainbow, eg: 1
kitronik_halo_hd.colors: Gets the RGB value of a known color
kitronik_halo_hd.createZIPHaloDisplay: Create a new ZIP LED driver for ZIP Halo Display.
kitronik_halo_hd.createZIPHaloDisplay|pa: number of leds in the strip, eg: 60
kitronik_halo_hd.hueToRGB:
Converts hue (0-360) to an RGB value. 
Does not attempt to modify luminosity or saturation. 
Colours end up fully saturated.
kitronik_halo_hd.listenForClap: Performs an action when a loud noise is detected, such as a clap
kitronik_halo_hd.listenForClap|param|cla: is the number of claps to listen out for before running the function eg: 1
kitronik_halo_hd.listenForClap|param|sou: is function that is run once detection in sound
kitronik_halo_hd.listenForClap|param|tim: is period of time in which to listen for the claps or spikes eg: 1
kitronik_halo_hd.onAlarmTrigger: Do something if the alarm is triggered
kitronik_halo_hd.readAverageSoundLevel: Read Sound Level blocks returns back a number 0-512 of the current sound level averaged over 5 samples
kitronik_halo_hd.readDate: Read date from RTC as a string
kitronik_halo_hd.readSoundLevel: Read Sound Level blocks returns back a number 0-512 of the current sound level at that point
kitronik_halo_hd.readTime: Read time from RTC as a string
kitronik_halo_hd.readTimeForZip: Read time parameter from RTC for ZIP display
kitronik_halo_hd.rgb: Converts value to red, green, blue channels
kitronik_halo_hd.rgb|param|blue: value of the blue channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
kitronik_halo_hd.rgb|param|green: value of the green channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
kitronik_halo_hd.rgb|param|red: value of the red channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
kitronik_halo_hd.setBuzzerPin: Setup micro:bit to play music through Halo HD buzzer
kitronik_halo_hd.setClapSensitivity: Set how sensitive the microphone is when detecting claps
kitronik_halo_hd.setDate: Set date on RTC as three numbers
kitronik_halo_hd.setDate|param|setDay: is to set the day in terms of numbers 1 to 31
kitronik_halo_hd.setTime: Set time on RTC, as three numbers
kitronik_halo_hd.simpleAlarmCheck: Determine if the alarm is triggered and return a boolean
kitronik_halo_hd.simpleAlarmSet|param|al: determines whether the alarm turns off automatically or the user turns it off
kitronik_halo_hd.simpleAlarmSet|param|ho: is the alarm hour setting (24 hour)
kitronik_halo_hd.wavelength: Converts wavelength value to red, green, blue channels
kitronik_halo_hd.writeDay: Set the day on the RTC
kitronik_halo_hd.writeHours: Set the hours on the RTC in 24 hour format
kitronik_halo_hd.writeMinutes: Set the minutes on the RTC
kitronik_halo_hd.writeMonth: set the month on the RTC
kitronik_halo_hd.writeSeconds: Set the seconds on the RTC
kitronik_halo_hd.writeYear: set the year on the RTC
